metadata.dc:author: Arch-Tirado, Emilio
Verduzco-Mendoza, Antonio
Collado-Corona, Miguel Angel
metadata.dc:description: Presently paper mentions the importance that has the use and the production of animal models in scientific research, the relevance that has its use to be able to make a good pursuit in the research, highlighting as well as to facilitate the reproductive of the study in question. Lastly it is mentioned the models more used in the field of the audiology.
metadata.dc:title: Producción y uso de modelos animales en el campo de la audiología.
[Use and production of biomedical models in the field of audiology].
